title: Typeface used in "Boxed" advertisements.
content:
Bold sans-serif typeface. I've used several font-finding programs and can't seem to get it exact.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FullSizeRender_4137.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FullSizeRender%20(1)_5058.jpg)

Font: 

 Avenir Next Pro Heavy 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171323/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: SeraviloArt

comments.content:
Likeliest candidate = Avenir Next Pro Heavy:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/avenir-next-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171323/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/avenir-next-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/avenir-next-pro/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Avenir_5152.png)

Playtype’s Nationale is also very close, but the |k| isn’t a match:  
 [https://playtype.com/font/nationale](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171323/https:/playtype.com/font/nationale "https://playtype.com/font/nationale")
